short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is used to convert text into your selected language

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Language translator extension is used to convert any text to any other language from a web page. To make this extension work user first needs to set his target language and destination language in the popup. Once the target and destination language is set, then user can convert any text by entering text using a popup. Other than this, user can double click on any text on a web page to get its translated text. Also when the user select any text or any paragraph on the web page, and open the context menu by clicking right, then in the context menu there is a button added to convert selected text into his destination language.
